settings.heading: Let Lumos Go To Work
settings.html: Some HTML content

• Box One
    Creating your tray
  • Box Two
    Whitening your teeth

settings.content: Learn the science behind teeth whitening and how each person’s journey to white teeth are unique to themselves. We’re here to educate you and support you on how to use our range of products to get the best result and whitest smile.
settings.html: Some HTML content

• 1 x Your Custom-fit Whitening Trays
  • 1 x Case
  • 3 x Whitening Gel Syringes
  • 3 x Desensitizing Gel Syringes
  • 1 x Neoprene Lumos Bag
Looking for Box 1?

Time Required:
45 mins - 2 hours
You will need:
Custom-fit Trays, Whitening Gel, Timer

Whitening Time

Start with applications of 45 minutes to 1 hour, and gradually work your way up to applications of approximately 2 hours as your teeth are comfortable.

Sensitive Teeth

If you have sensitive teeth, we recommend starting with shorter sessions and using the Lumos Densensitizing Gel for 20 minutes after each whitening application.

Best Results

Use Lumos Smile 5-7 days consecutively for your initial treatment.

Maintenance

We recommend 2-3 applications per month after your initial treatment.
Some HTML content
Previous Step

settings.section_sub_heading: How Long To Whiten Your Teeth

settings.html:
Time Required:
10 mins
You will need:
Towel, Timer

Brush & Floss

Make sure your teeth are freshly scrubbed and flossed.

Clean Hands

Wash and dry your hands before you start.

Timer

Get a timer ready to time your session.
Some HTML content
Previous Step

Time Required:
2 mins
You will need:
Custom-fit Trays, Whitening Gel Syringe

Remove the syringe tip and save for recapping!.

Apply a thin connected line of whitening gel along the front base of your tray where your teeth come into contact with.

Don't worry about extending the gel line to the back of your tray - just the teeth you see when you smile!.

Lumos Tip

If you squeeze too much gel into the tray just gently wipe the excess out but be careful you don’t want that gel to go to waste.
Some HTML content
Previous Step

settings.section_sub_heading: Placing The Gel Into Your Trays

settings.html:
Time Required:
5 mins
You will need:
Hands, Timer

Place your trays into your mouth.

Wipe off any excess gel off of your gumline.

Set a timer and relax!

Lumos Tip

Use room temperature water to brush and rinse your mouth.
Some HTML content
Previous Step

settings.section_sub_heading: Putting Your Trays Into Your Mouth

settings.html:
Time Required:
5 mins
You will need:
Hands, Toothbrush, Floss

Remove the trays from your mouth.

Brush off any excess gel and floss.

If you are teeth are feeling sensitive, use our desensitizing gel to help alleviate your symptoms.

Lumos Tip

Zingers and spotty looking teeth are normal after whitening, don't worry, it's only temporary. We promise!
Some HTML content
Previous Step

Time Required:
15-20 mins
You will need:
Custom-fit Trays, Desensitizing Gel

Remove the syringe tip and save for recapping!

After you complete your session, clean your trays, and apply the desensitizing gel the same way you apply the whitening gel.

Our desensitizing gel will nourish your teeth and minimize sensitivity after each session.

Learn More about desensitizing gel’s use & ingredients.

A Good Impression
A Bad Impression
